Sequence Information.Peptide Name: ALFPm10 (Anti-lipopolysaccharide factor P. monodon 10; natural AMPs; shrimp, Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 1S=S, UCSS1)
Sequence Information.Source: the giant tiger prawn, Asian tiger shrimp, black tiger shrimp,Penaeus monodon

Literature.Author: Li G, Chen J, Shang C, Wang C. 2022
Literature.Title: Structural Characteristics, Prokaryotic Expression and Activity Analysis of Antimicrobial Peptide ALFPm10 from Penaeus monodon

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (52.53%) toPcALF1GRAVY: -0.334; Mol formula:  C495H797N136O145S3; M. Wt: 11079.761, and Mol ex coeff.:19755.Activity: at 24 uM, it could inhibit the growth of Bacillus, Bacillus sp. T2; V. parahaemolyticus, A. hydrophila, V.harveyi, and S. agalactiae. Reg 12/2021
